__TOC__


=== Python Series ===
The Development Focus Group is conducts sessions on python for beginners.  The classes will be based on <nowiki>[[http://www.swaroopch.com/notes/Python|A byte of Python]]</nowiki> by Swaroop C H and held weekly.  There will be at least 1 challenge every month with Q and A sessions for the same.
